headline: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) Market Analysis Report 2025-2035 | Increase in Clinical Trials and Investments will Accelerate the Development of Innovative Treatments
summary: The ALS market is witnessing robust growth driven by increased disease awareness, advancements in genetic research, and an expanding pipeline of therapeutic drugs. ALS, a neurodegenerative disease affecting motor neurons, is transitioning from symptomatic treatment to targeted therapies, including gene and disease-modifying therapies. North America leads this market due to strong healthcare infrastructure and investments. Key challenges include high treatment costs and limited awareness in emerg
